description: As the UI/UX team lead at Binagora, I worked with clients such as Disney, Honest Culture, and OnPrem. I was responsible for redesigning their internal applications and tackling mobile and web development projects from the ground up, ensuring seamless user experiences across platforms.

I was responsible for the user experience (UX) and screen design at HICX Solutions. My work focused on optimizing user interaction with the platform, ensuring that the design was intuitive and functional, tailored to the specific needs of the company's users.

I worked on a product named ATAshphere, designed to manage, migrate and protect any-to-any combinations of on-premises, enviroments, hypervisors, private clouds and public clouds. ATAsphere can function as a unified, end-to-end solution or as a module that integrates seamlessly with existing transformation initiative and technologies.

I worked with several U.S.-based clients, including Rockstar Games, FOX, Best Day, and CITI-BANK. In these projects, I was responsible for developing the user experience, designing the interface, and handling the front-end development.
